humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are 0/6 positive lymph nodes ( Regional 0/6) in the regional lymph nodes. Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 0 out of 6 regional lymph nodes are positive for metastasis (0/6). This corresponds to an N0 stage, which means there is no evidence of regional lymph node metastasis.
